thread.title: Germany's Schaeffler rises in market debut
thread.title_full: Germany's Schaeffler rises in market debut | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Germany's Schaeffler rises in market debut
text:
FRANKFURT German automotive parts maker Schaeffler ( SHA_p.DE ) rose 8 percent in its first day of trading on Friday in one of Germany's largest initial public offerings (IPO) this year.
The shares opened at 13.50 euros, above the issue price of 12.50 euros ($14.10) apiece, after having been offered in a 12-14 euro range.
The flotation follows the listings of plastic maker Covestro ( 1COV.DE ) and classifieds group Scout24 ( G24n.DE ), which suffered from wobbly markets while building materials maker Xella pulled its IPO earlier this week.
(Reporting by Arno Schuetze and Maria Sheahan ; Editing by Kirsti Knolle)
